title: Swarna Vanka Bangaru Kajulu: Diamond-Accented Gold Bangles
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds with SI clarity and G-H color.
features: Elegant S-shaped design meticulously crafted with interspersed diamond clusters. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, providing a rich, warm tone. The bangle showcases a contemporary take on traditional Kadas (Kajulu) with a flexible, lightweight form.
colors: Radiant gold with the sparkle of colorless diamonds.
occasions: and modern social gatherings. Adds a touch of subtle elegance to any attire.
description: A modern interpretation of traditional South Indian bangles (Kajulu). The diamond accents add a touch of luxury and brilliance. The flexible design ensures comfort and ease of wear. This is an ideal choice for the discerning woman who appreciates both tradition and contemporary style.
